tag_professor: Respected (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Mrs. Martin is a wonderful teacher. I\'ve taken four of her biology/ecology classes and they have been informative and a genuine pleasure. She is always willing to help and is so excited about her field. There is a lot of information to remember in this class and the tests are thorough. GREAT TEACHER!

tag_professor: Respected (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I took four classes with Sara Martin at my time at HCC, and between HCC and one other college I\'ve been to, she is one of the best professors I\'ve ever had. She\'s always willing to help, she finds real-world ways to make you care about the topics, and offers really interesting extra credit which usually involves meaningful volunteer work.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Very nice, knowledgeable in her field. Very helpful, with fun projects. Three types of homework- lab questions, chapter questions, study guide. Can get overwhelming, but tests aren\'t too hard.
